info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 7:56PM EDT until August 03 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Saratoga County in east central New York... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 756 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rock City Falls, or 12 miles west of Saratoga Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Saratoga Springs, Ballston Spa, North Ballston Spa, Rock City Falls, Kings, Mount Pleasant, Wilton, Greenfield, Shaw Corners, Milton Center, Kings Station, Barkersville, West Milton, Glenwild, Greenfield Center, Wiley Corners, Long Corners, North Greenfield, Porter Corners and East Galway. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
